shortdesc.ph: Sets a preset voice beautifier effect.

section.p: Call this method to set a preset voice beautifier effect for the local user who sends an audio stream. After setting a voice beautifier effect, all users in the channel can hear the effect. You can set different audio effects for different scenarios. For details, see Set the Voice Beautifier and Audio Effects.
For better voice effects, Agora recommends that you call and set scenario to (3) and profile to (4) or (5) before calling this method.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter in to (1) or (6), or the method will not take effect.
This method works best with the human voice. Agora does not recommend using this method for audio containing music.
After calling this method, Agora recommends not calling the following methods, because they can override \ref IRtcEngine::setVoiceBeautifierPreset "setVoiceBeautifierPreset":

plentry.pd: The preset voice beautifier effect option: .
